response.overview: "This DVD is a must for every Christian. On this DVD, one of Dave Hunt’s excellent presentations is combined with many inserts inter alia footage shot at the Parliament of the World’s Religions which took place during 1 to 8 December 1999 in Cape Town, South Africa.  "Dave Hunt clearly explains the difference between naturalism and supernaturalism. You see and hear many of the phenomena about which he speaks such as the occult practices which are so rampant in the Christian Church today. Besides this there are inserts of the prayers by ancestral worshippers, the presentation of the Earth Charter to former President Nelson Mandela, as well as those who worship Mother Earth and many more."
response.title: Occult Invasion of the Church
